scripts.start: docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml run --rm npm-env npm run start:docker
scripts.build: docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml run --rm npm-env npm run build:docker
scripts.rebuild-deps: docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml run --rm npm-env npm run rebuild-deps:docker
scripts.install-deps: docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml run --rm npm-env npm install
scripts.test: docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml run --rm npm-env npm test:docker
scripts.test:watch: docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml run --rm npm-env npm run test:watch:docker
scripts.test:debug: docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml run --rm npm-env npm run test:debug:docker
scripts.monitor: docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml run --rm npm-env npm run monitor:docker
scripts.monitor:dev: docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml run --rm npm-env npm run monitor:dev:docker
scripts.monitor:debug: docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml run --rm npm-env npm run monitor:debug:docker
scripts.debug:all: docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml run --rm npm-env npm run debug:all:docker
scripts.lint: docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml run --rm npm-env npm run lint:docker
scripts.format: docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml run --rm npm-env npm run format:docker
scripts.rebuild:python: npm run clean:python && npm run setup:python
scripts.docker:check: command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo 'Docker is not installed. Using local Python environment.'; exit 0; }
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:check && docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml build
scripts.docker:up: npm run docker:check && docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml up
scripts.docker:down: npm run docker:check && docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.docker:clean: npm run docker:check && docker-compose -f python/docker-compose.yml down -v
scripts.docker:rebuild: npm run docker:clean && npm run docker:build
scripts.debug:all:docker: ./python/run-with-venv.sh DEBUG=n8n:* npm run test && npm run monitor:debug
